mapper.select: SELECT substring_index(OD.order_num,'-',1) AS orderDate, OD.order_num, PD.pro_name, SUM(DT.detail_cnt) AS detail_cnt, DT.stus, OD.m_id FROM product_order OD JOIN order_detail DT ON OD.order_num=DT.order_num JOIN product PD ON PD.pro_no=DT.pro_no WHERE m_id=#{s_m_id} ORDER BY order_num DESC LIMIT 0, 2

SELECT substring_index(TT.tck_num,'-',1) AS orderDate, TT.tck_num, TT.m_id, TT.c_no, TT.cnt, TT.stus, CC.title, CC.date FROM ticket_order TT JOIN concert CC ON TT.c_no=CC.c_no WHERE m_id=#{s_m_id} ORDER BY tck_num DESC LIMIT 0, 2

SELECT Q.q_no, qname, subject, Q.pro_no, Q.edit, Q.regdate AS qdate, a_no, A.p_id, content, A.regdate AS adate, pro_name, postername FROM qna Q JOIN answer A ON Q.q_no=A.q_no JOIN product P ON P.pro_no=Q.pro_no WHERE qname=#{s_m_id} ORDER BY q_no DESC
SELECT q_no, subject, Q.pro_no, Q.edit, Q.regdate, a_stus, p_id, pro_name, postername FROM qna Q JOIN product P ON Q.pro_no=P.pro_no WHERE qname=#{s_m_id} AND a_stus='N' ORDER BY q_no DESC
